hints.content:
Every bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Which bill matches the image?

Let's label the value of bill.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/31af2af3eb1a746a8e21e91268cf4bfd4530786b.png)

$\underbrace{\goldE{\$10} + \goldE{\$10}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ ten dollar bills}}}  + \underbrace{\purpleD{\$5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}}+ \underbrace{\blueE{\$1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ dollar bill}}} $

Now, let's add our ten dollar bills first: $\goldE{\$10} + \goldE{\$10}= \goldE{\$20}$

$\underbrace{\goldE{\$20}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ ten dollar bills}}}  + \underbrace{\purpleD{\$5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}}+ \underbrace{\blueE{\$1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ dollar bill}}} $

Last, let's add the values of all the sets of bills.

$\underbrace{\goldE{\$20}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ ten dollar bills}}}  + \underbrace{\purpleD{\$5}}_{\purpleD{1}{\text{ five dollar bill}}}+ \underbrace{\blueE{\$1}}_{\blueE{1}{\text{ dollar bill}}}  =\$26$

question.content:
**What is the total value of the bills below?**

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/31af2af3eb1a746a8e21e91268cf4bfd4530786b.png)
